0.user_question: For Halloween Emily received 5 pieces of candy from neighbors and 13 pieces from her older sister. If she only ate 9 pieces a day, how long would the candy last her?

ost_step.1: Add the amount of candy Emily received from each source. She got 5 pieces from neighbors and 13 pieces from her older sister. So, she has 5 pieces + 13 pieces = 18 pieces of candy.
ost_step.2: Divide the total number of candy pieces by the number of pieces she eats per day to find out how long the candy will last her. There are 18 pieces of candy / 9 pieces per day = 2 days.
